attributes.action: Commissioner Hogan-Howe of the MET should resign
attributes.additional_details:
Commissioner Hogan-Howe of the Metropolitan Police Force should resign.
He has failed to increase diversity or deal with racism in the force as demonstrated by the witch hunt against Carol Hunt.
He has failed to deliver the job cuts or increase efficiency within the force.
He has spent more time protecting his force and forgets the police are here to serve us not their self-interest.
